description: Situated in the famous Elephant hotel (with which it shares a name), this restaurant has a unique, historic ambience thanks to its decor of antique wood panelling. The cuisine here is regional with a modern twist, featuring dishes such as char with cream of celery and green apple on a bed of fragrant elderflowers. The interesting wine list boasts a selection of almost a thousand different labels.
facilitiesServices: ['Car park', 'Garden or park', 'Interesting wine list', 'Restaurant offering vegetarian menus', 'Terrace', 'Wheelchair access']
